tool_description: Calculates readability metrics using multiple algorithms and provides recommendations for improving text accessibility and comprehension.
error_messages: Invalid grade level: Target grade level must be between 1 and 16.
Text too short: Minimum 100 characters required for reliable readability scoring.
Text too long: Maximum 30,000 characters allowed.
usage: Provide text and optionally specify target grade level. Returns comprehensive readability metrics and improvement suggestions.

grade_level.description: Estimated grade level required to understand text

readability_assessment.description: Overall readability assessment (excellent, good, fair, difficult)
